mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue (fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address, createBy, createTime, id) values (#{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{id} )
